import React, { useState } from "react"; import { addBooks } from "../Utilis/handleBooks"; import "../Style/AddBook.css"; function AddBook({setBook}) { const [Book_id,setBookid] = useState(""); const [Title,setTitle] = useState(""); const [Author,setAuthor] = useState(""); const [Price,setPrice] = useState(""); const [Available,setAvailable] = useState(""); const handleSubmit = async(e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); const newBook={ Book_id:Book_id, Title:Title, Author:Author, Price:Price, Available:Available } setBook(newBook); await addBooks(newBook); } return (
